fullText: David Adjmi's sprawling three-hour drama about a 1970s rock band recording an album is an immersive theatrical experience that captures the creative process in all its messy, exhilarating glory.
dtliExcerpt: David Adjmi's sprawling three-hour drama about a 1970s rock band recording an album is an immersive theatrical experience that captures the creative process in all its messy, exhilarating glory.
